description: a(n)=c(p(n))/p(n), where c = Perrin sequence A001608 (starting 0,2,3,...) and p(n) = n-th prime.
references: An Insufficient Condition for Primality, Problem 10268, American Mathematical Monthly, v. 103, n. 10, p. 911, Dec. 1996.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..200
crossrefs: See A001608, the main entry for the Perrin sequence.
author: _Clark Kimberling_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
